abstract: Many questions remain unanswered about death of Amy Lam, who bled to death after undergoing number of surgical procedures following childbirth at Harlem Hospital Center, and her family has filed legal claim against hospital and several doctors; death is part of troubling rise in maternal mortality rate in United States.

headline.print_headline: A Death After Childbirth, Then a Trail of Questions
headline.main: A Woman Dies After Childbirth, and Her Husband Asks Why

keywords.value: New York City Health and Hospitals Corp
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Amy Lam, who prematurely gave birth in her bathroom, bled to death after a series of surgical procedures at Harlem Hospital Center. Now her family has accused the hospital of malpractice and negligence....
lead_paragraph: Amy Lam, who prematurely gave birth in her bathroom, bled to death after a series of surgical procedures at Harlem Hospital Center. Now her family has accused the hospital of malpractice and negligence.
